videos.title: EP04: UEFA Ruins Euro 24 Party | Japan Destroys Vending Machines | Ambev and Ipiranga Became Banks
videos.description:
In this episode, we discuss how UEFA, Instagram and other social media ruined the epic Euro 24 celebration during a The Killers concert. The show was paused to broadcast the last minutes of the semi-final between England and the Netherlands at the London stadium, resulting in England's victory. Fans, while celebrating and filming the moment, had their accounts banned when they captured the game broadcast in the background. An epic gratuitous "commercial" that became a huge headache.

Additionally, we explore Japan's decision to destroy millions of vending machines due to the creation of a new banknote that will render them inoperable, highlighting the challenges for companies with legacy software. We also address how Brazilian companies such as Ambev and Ipiranga are transforming into banks, after receiving authorization from the Central Bank, and how this impacts the market.

Finally, we present our new project, showing how it is possible to set up a company from scratch without any employees, using only market tools and artificial intelligence.

00:00:00 PRESENTATION
00:01:12 UEFA SPOILS EURO 24 PARTY 
00:14:28 JAPAN DESTROYS VENDING MACHINES (DISCUSSION ON LEGACY SOFTWARE)
00:27:30 ARE AMBEV AND IPIRANGA THE NEW "BANKS" ON THE MARKET? 
00:33:10 HOW TO SET UP A BUSINESS USING AI AND MARKET TOOLS
00:49:49 CLOSING

#Euro24 #TheKillers #UEFA #InstagramBan #Japan #VendingMachines #SoftwareLegado #Ambev #Ipiranga #IA #StartupNegÃ³cios

videos.title: Understand Why Artificial Intelligence is the Opportunity of the Century! #technology #business #ia
videos.description:
Discover how artificial intelligence is opening new doors for entrepreneurs and professionals in the digital market! In this video, Pedro Barreto and Bruno Ferrer explore the fascinating comparison between the rise of the internet in the 2000s and the transformative impact of AI today. They discuss how companies that anticipated the importance of the internet were able to quickly stand out, taking advantage of the lack of competition and accessible opportunities. Now, as AI redefines entire industries, it's crucial to understand how it can be the key to reaching new heights of success. 

#Artificial Intelligence #Digital Market #Digital Transformation #Entrepreneurship #Innovation
tags: AI and jobs of the future

videos.title: Powerful Business Partnerships: How Media and Artificial Intelligence Are Transforming the Market
videos.description: In this video, we explore emerging business partnerships between media companies and AI technology giants. Discover how these strategic collaborations are revolutionizing content production, improving service personalization and creating new business opportunities. We analyze success stories, the benefits of these alliances and the future impacts on the sector. Watch to understand how the union of media and AI is shaping the future of the industry and driving innovation.

videos.title: Use of Data in AI: Controversial Microsoft Statement and Impacts on Business
videos.description: We explore Microsoft's controversial statement about using internet data for AI training and its significant impacts on business. Discover how this approach is shaping the future of business and join the discussion about ethics and strategies for technological advancement.

videos.title: Olympics Will Be Narrated by Artificial Intelligence ðŸ¤–. #ia #technology
videos.description:
In this video, we discuss NBC's groundbreaking decision to use artificial intelligence to chronicle the highlights of the 2024 Olympics, featuring the voice of legendary sportscaster Al Michaels. We explore how AI is transforming sports coverage and the technology's impact on live broadcasts.

NBC will utilize the AI-generated voice of Al Michaels to bring a unique, futuristic experience to viewers. Discover how this technology works, the benefits and challenges of its application in the world of sports.

Watch and leave your comments about what you think of this technological innovation!

#2024Olympics #NBC #Artificial Intelligence #AINarration #AlMichaels #Technological Innovation #Sports"

videos.title: AI and Post-Death Voice: From Fiction to Reality - A Current Dilemma.  #ia #artificialintelligence
videos.description: We explore the use of post-mortem voice with artificial intelligence. This use raises ethical questions about the future of voices in digital media, echoing the controversy generated by last year's Volkswagen commercial, which digitally resurrected the voice of late singer Elis Regina. How does technology redefine our interactions with the past and present?
tags: use of AI in the media

videos.description:
In this episode, we explore the latest controversies and innovations in the world of artificial intelligence: the position of Microsoft's head of AI on the use of internet data, TikTok's new attack on Meta with a new social network, as well as NBC using AI with Al Michaels for Olympics coverage.

videos.title: AI: Opportunity or Obstacle for Startups? #technology #business #ia
videos.description: In this video, we discuss how artificial intelligence is impacting the emergence of new startups. Is AI smoothing the path for innovators or creating unexpected challenges?
